items.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
items.tips: Place feet on bench to avoid ankle strain.
items.desc: Lie on bench and press dumbbells from chest to straight arms.

items.name: Seated Cable Face Pull
items.tips: Pull rope to eyebrow level, pause 1 s.
items.desc: Seated; pull cable toward face to work rear delts/upper back.

items.name: Seated DB Overhead Press
items.tips: Keep back supported; do not stand.
items.desc: Press dumbbells overhead while seated upright.

items.name: Rope Triceps Press-down
items.desc: Push cable rope downward, fully extending elbows.

items.name: Dead-bug Hold
items.tips: Keep lower back glued to floor.
items.desc: On back, lower opposite arm & leg while bracing core.

items.name: One-arm DB Row
items.desc: Row dumbbell with one arm; opposite knee & hand on bench.

items.name: Assisted Pull-up / Band Lat Pull-down
items.desc: Use band/machine to mimic pull-up, driving elbows down.

items.name: Incline DB Reverse Fly
items.desc: Raise light dumbbells sideways on incline; targets rear delts.

items.name: Seated Curl (DB or EZ-bar)
items.desc: Curl weight up while seated; palms face up.

items.name: Cable Pallof Press
items.desc: Press cable straight out, keeping torso still to train core.

items.name: Thoracic Foam Roll
items.desc: Roll mid‑back gently on foam roller.

items.name: Cat‑Cow
items.desc: Alternate arching and rounding back on hands & knees.

items.name: Band Face Pull + External Rotation
items.desc: Pull band to face, then externally rotate shoulders.

items.name: Band Pull‑apart (palms up)
items.desc: Stretch band apart at shoulder height.

items.name: Bird‑dog
items.desc: Reach opposite arm & leg; keep core stable.

items.name: Prone Y‑T‑W Raises
items.desc: Lift arms in Y, T, W shapes lying face‑down.

items.name: Scapular Push‑ups
items.desc: Protract/retract shoulder blades in plank position.

items.name: Dead Hang / Lying Lat Stretch
items.desc: Hang from bar or reach overhead on floor to stretch lats.

items.name: Doorway Pec Stretch
items.desc: Press forearm on doorway; lean forward.

items.name: Child's Pose + Side Reach
items.desc: Sit back on heels; reach arms to side for lat stretch.
